Class APIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.web.controller.APIController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="api/")
public class APIController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for API functions.

    Handles mappings of $PASTAUrl$/api/...

      • viewGradeCentreAPI

        @RequestMapping(value="latestMarks",
                method=GET)
public void viewGradeCentreAPI(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                     @RequestParam(value="username")
                                     java.lang.String username,
                                     @RequestParam(value="password")
                                     java.lang.String password)
        Get the latest marks

        Authenticate against the system, if successful, get the latest marks as a csv. In cases where there are no attempts, put "-".

        Parameters:
        response - the http response which will be used
        username - the username in plaintext
        password - the password in plaintext
